div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1862 Spinawarai, near Charsadda (anc. Peucolaotis), Gandhara, Pakistan, before 1946 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 1 AR, 4 AE. Pot hoard Apollodotus II: 1 AE Hippostratus: 3 AE Artemidorus: 1 tetradr. Disposition: unknown Haughton, NC 1946, pp. 143-4 Shortt, NC 1963, p. 19
